languages.text: {n}Соломон пожирает глазами одинокую страничку рапорта, словно не решается поднять взгляд на вас. На смуглых щеках проступает слабый румянец.{/n}
{n}Solomorne devours the solitary page of the report with his eyes, as if he is hesitant to look up at you. A faint blush creeps across his cheeks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон пожирает глазами одинокую страничку рапорта, словно не решается поднять взгляд на вас. На смуглых щеках проступает слабый румянец.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne plante ses yeux sur l'unique page du rapport, comme s'il craignait de croiser votre regard. Ses joues rougissent légèrement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne devours the solitary page of the report with his eyes, as if he is hesitant to look up at you. A faint blush creeps across his cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne plante ses yeux sur l'unique page du rapport, comme s'il craignait de croiser votre regard. Ses joues rougissent légèrement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは報告書の一枚きりのページを目でむさぼるように読み、まるであなたを見上げるのをためらっているかのようだった。彼の頬にほのかな赤みがさっと広がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne devours the solitary page of the report with his eyes, as if he is hesitant to look up at you. A faint blush creeps across his cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは報告書の一枚きりのページを目でむさぼるように読み、まるであなたを見上げるのをためらっているかのようだった。彼の頬にほのかな赤みがさっと広がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne devora la única página del informe con la mirada, como si no se atreviera a mirarte. Un leve rubor aparece en sus mejillas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne devours the solitary page of the report with his eyes, as if he is hesitant to look up at you. A faint blush creeps across his cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne devora la única página del informe con la mirada, como si no se atreviera a mirarte. Un leve rubor aparece en sus mejillas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的目光死死地盯着眼前的报告，仿佛不愿抬头看你一样，一阵淡淡的红色漫过了他的脸颊。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne devours the solitary page of the report with his eyes, as if he is hesitant to look up at you. A faint blush creeps across his cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的目光死死地盯着眼前的报告，仿佛不愿抬头看你一样，一阵淡淡的红色漫过了他的脸颊。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sanki sana bakmaktan utanıyormuşçasına gözlerini rapora kenetliyor. O esnada yanakları hafifçe kızarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne devours the solitary page of the report with his eyes, as if he is hesitant to look up at you. A faint blush creeps across his cheeks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, sanki sana bakmaktan utanıyormuşçasına bakışlarını rapora kenetliyor. O esnada yanakları hafifçe kızarıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne fixiert die Seite des Berichtes, als wolle er vermeiden, dir in die Augen zu sehen. Eine leichte Röte huscht über seine Wangen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne devours the solitary page of the report with his eyes, as if he is hesitant to look up at you. A faint blush creeps across his cheeks.{/n}
